Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40548 affecting package shim-unsigned-x64 for versions less than 15.8-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-40548 affecting package shim-unsigned-x64 for versions less than 15.8-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package shim-unsigned-x64 is earlier than 15.8-1, affected by CVE-2023-40548
